citations.narrative:
The sanitization of the guinea pig primary enclosures is not being documented every two weeks. The facility
representative described the cleaning procedure, but there are no records of the enclosures being cleaned and sanitized
every two weeks as required. Routine sanitization of the primary enclosures with a safe and effective disinfectant
prevents the spread of disease and ensures the welfare of the animals.
Correct by 28 October 2021
This is a 1st Relicense Inspection for a Class “C” license. The inspection and exit briefing were conducted with the
Applicant.
All items must be in compliance within 2 more inspection(s) or by 12 November 2021 or the applicant will forfeit the
license fee and must wait 6 months to reapply. Please contact your inspector to schedule your next Relicense Inspection.
Regulated activity can continue under your existing USDA license until it expires.
End Section
